function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Population-based approach does not account for age structure of the population, impacting the spread of disease","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to disease spread and potential for higher mortality rates in specific age groups","Mitigation":"Consider incorporating age structure data into the model to better understand and address age-specific transmission dynamics","Technologies":"Population-based modeling incorporating age-specific transmission rates","People":"Population health researchers, epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Model does not deterministically account for travel between regions","Impact":"Potential underestimation of disease spread due to inadequate consideration of inter-regional transmission","Mitigation":"Incorporate travel data and transmission rates between regions to more accurately capture disease propagation","Technologies":"Spatial modeling techniques, travel data integration, inter-regional transmission modeling","People":"Epidemiologists, spatial modelers, public health officials","Owner":"Health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Misreporting in the SI-VIC database, leading to discrepancies in patient data","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of disease incidence and patient movement between hospitals, compromising data integrity","Mitigation":"Implement data validation processes and correction mechanisms to address misreporting and data discrepancies","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms, quality control processes, patient data reconciliation tools","People":"Database administrators, public health analysts, hospital staff","Owner":"Health authorities, database management teams"}]}
